entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
